2 3,499 16,554 2,079 175 Dec 880,520 2,573 13,936 2,637 172 Total 1943 9,367,194 40,773 165,648 51,372 2,505 1944 Jan 789,342 2,963 14,521 5,834 485 Feb 692,131 1,431 12,641 9,782 175 Mar 966,739 461 13,563 15,565 55 Apr 814,996 871 10,482 14,724 (49) May 797,798 I 437 7,670 18,775 64 Jun 658,013 236 8,504 17,358 90 Jul 734,034 15 4,900 12,509 63 Aug 840,857 10 3,385 17,989 21 Sep 750,219 110 2,638 17,628 56 Oct 465,547 Nov 584,190 Dec 475,712 Total 1944 8,569,578 6,583 1945 Jan 541,021 Feb 576,630 4,360 Mar 852,592 2,000 Apr 660,795 1,470 མྤ-ཕེ ུཙ; (4,897) 11,075 35 4,600 17,498 27 3,824 18,696 29 81,831 177,433 1,051 4,884 15,521 25 8,001 13,436 6 8,359 14,655 8 9,233 13,611 14 May 728,663 1,362 Jun 516,397 1,951 Jul 548,870 2,844 I 1 11,364 10,636 22 9,565 13,057 35 10,761 9,584 28 Aug 425,362 Total 1945 4,850,330 1,084 15,071 11,881 7,546 8 (5) 74,048 98,046 146 Grand Total $24,961,854 $15,071 $47,351 $355,873 $350,771 $4,202   ## p. 672 (#696) ############################################  Appendix 30 (continued) Expenditures from Direct Appropriations by Major Project July 1942 to August 1945 (thousands of dollars; figures in parenthesis are negative) Procurement Aircraft Aircraft Ind/Org* Miscellaneous Photographic Maps/ Maintenance Fuel/Oil Equipment Equipment Equipment Mapping 1942 Jul 8,710 6,509 25,148 12,386 751 250 Aug 10,360 4,552 31,581 14,271 1,200 15 Sep 13,456 8,009 43,403 16,289 1,925 143 Oct 15,065 7,723 56,681 14,842 2,352 925 Nov 43,948 5,624 33,843 4,184 1,491 80 Dec 21,716 9,633 61,364 10,057 554 1,192 Total 1942 113,255 42,050 252,020 72,029 8,273 2,605 1943 Jan 20,508 8,993 53,843 4,223 3,807 199 Feb 20,552 7,926 41,797 4,139 1,402 565 Mar 45,480 39,257 27,092 47,881 2,985 218 Apr 23,718 9,321 47,931 3,631 2,937 1,118 May 32,371 9,365 78,006 6,180 655 13 Jun 57,144 31,180 84,942 13,855 3,611 (505) Jul 36,075 33,894 71,023 23,418 958 2,322 Aug 37,876 21,154 53,385 15,398 1,087 242 Sep 49,714 89,572 49,377 13,584 1,258 197 Oct 40,161 30,607 41
